Key Match Events: Bulgaria scored the only goal of the game due to a mistake by Bailey Peacock-Farrell
Michael O’Neill shifted Conor Bradley to a more central position in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: Northern Ireland knew the match would be tough due to Bulgaria's physicality and the pitch conditions
Post-Match Reflections: Michael O’Neill expressed frustration over the nature of the goal and the pitch
The loss was a tough test and a learning experience for Northern Ireland
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a poor pitch, which affected both teams
The match was the second in three days for Northern Ireland
